name: Yo-kai Watch 3
description:
Stay tuned for details about this game—coming soon!They've come again! Yo-kai big boom!! The next stage is overseas, in the USA! Over 600 yo-kai have appeared!
Operate two protagonists and enjoy a great adventure between the USA and Japan!

In "Yo-Kai Watch 3 Sushi / Tempura", the main character Kata has moved overseas to the USA! New yo-kai such as "Meriken Youkai" have been added, and the total number of yo-kai has increased to more than 600. On the other hand, in Japan, the new hero Inaho and USA Pyon will launch the "Mysterious Detective Agency" to solve the mysterious cases caused by yo-kai.
